title: Weather Service
description: We're creating a weather service and we need your help! Clone the repository and work on the assigned tasks. When you're finished, create a pull request. This will trigger a suite of tests to check if the requirements have been met. After your code is successfully merged we may assign more tasks.
author: Dan Koster

tasks.title: Temperature feels like
tasks.instructions: Implement the 'feels' property to return the name of the appropriate temperature range.

tasks.title: Add Celcius conversion
tasks.instructions: Implement Celcius conversion. Add a constructor parameter called 'scale' accepting 'F' or 'C' and convert the temperatures appropriately. Default to 'F'. Add 'c' and 'f' properties to the class and return correct temperatures.
